prompt: Create an app lock screen with a gradient background (from deep purple to indigo) and a centered layout. Display a lock icon (Icons.lock_outline) at the top, sized at 85 pixels with a white color. Below, show the title 'Unlock App' in bold 26px white text, followed by a subtitle 'Enter 4-digit PIN' in 14px light purple text with 12px spacing. Create a 4-digit PIN input section with 4 circular containers (50x50 pixels) with purple borders, arranged horizontally with 8px spacing. Each container shows an empty circle or a filled white circle for entered digits. Below, include a 3x4 grid keypad with numbers 1-9, 0, and a delete button. Keypad buttons are 60x60 pixels, circular with a semi-transparent purple background and white text. Use 25px spacing between elements and wrap the layout in a Column with MainAxisAlignment.center and 15px padding.
